definition: the sound made by a hen, as in calling her chicks, to make a clucking sounds, characteristic of hens
details:
noun
- the sound made by a hen, as in calling her chicks
= example: the sound made by a hen, as in calling her chicks
= synonyms: clucking
verb
- to make a clucking sounds, characteristic of hens
= example: to make a clucking sounds, characteristic of hens
= synonyms: click
